aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify this retro game. Extract: platform, title, publisher, region, year, packaging status.
aiHints.gradingRules: Assess: cartridge/disc condition, label condition, box condition (if CIB), manual condition, seal (if sealed).
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: rarity, platform, CIB vs loose, sealed status, condition, market demand.
